version_description:
- Chromecast support!
- Improved video experience
- Squashing bugs

- Hotfix for reported crashes
- Still comes with Chromecast support!
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Got a big screen? Now you have it covered.

- Added iPad support. Bigger screen. Bigger video. Rotate to any orientation all that cool stuff
- Remember that gray navigation bar in the Chromecast screen? Now it’s yellow as sunshine

- We’ve put our bug squishing boots on and committed horrendous crimes against bug-kind

Even bigger screen?
Look, you also can stream videos from VRV to your Apple TV (and other Airplay compatible devices).
While playing an episode, open Control Center (keep VRV active) and select the device you want to stream to.
Yeah, we know, it’s weird, but it works! We’re looking forward to making Airplay streaming more user-friendly in the next versions.

We made fixes!

- Fixed: When over-rotating the iPhone, the app would sometimes crash
- Fixed: UI issues you’ve probably never seen

do carry on…

Saw an awesome episode on VRV? Now you can share it with your friends through VRV on social media platforms.
Also we're bringing push notifications to VRV so you can stay up-to-date with what's happening in the app.
Improvements for reliability.

- Added labels for Subs and Dubs. Now you can tell if a series is dubbed or subtitled before you watch. (Hint: if you’re looking for dubs, try the Funimation channel, and if you’re looking for subs, try the Crunchyroll channel)
- Also lots of bug fixes and improvements

- Added labels for Subs and Dubs. Now you can tell if a series is dubbed or subtitled before you watch. (Hint: if you’re looking for dubs, try the Funimation channel, and if you’re looking for subs, try the Crunchyroll channel)
- Also lots of bug fixes and improvements
Minor changes and bug eradication.

Curious to see ALL the content VRV has to offer?
Now you can VIEW ALL the shows and movies on VRV or with any channel in one comprehensive view.

Curious to see ALL the content VRV has to offer?
Now you can VIEW ALL the shows and movies on VRV or with any channel in one comprehensive view.
Some minor stability improvements.
Video enhancement and stability improvements.
Offline Viewing now available on iOS for Premium Members! On your Premium-access channels, sync episodes ahead of time so you can watch while on-the-go, even in areas without an internet connection.

We heard you’ve got that shiny new Apple device. Well, we’ve adjusted VRV to fit nicely in it.
Also, a lot of small UI adjustments await you inside.
And we’ve worked hard at pre-holiday cleaning and overall performance improvement.
This update squashes bugs and stabilizes your application experience.

Optimized for iOS 13
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes for a more stable experience
Welcome our updated Watchlist, which puts the power of "on demand" in your streaming hands.

- Search is even more stellar with the new Top Results display, which fulfills your queries with relevant episodes, series, or movies.
- We captured the usual bugs and released them back to nature. Sorry, not really, we totally deleted them.
Expiration dates are no more. Synced videos now automatically renew.
Did you enjoy a show and want more? Now we have “More Like This” - a recommended collection of content similar to your favorite series.
Some users were having trouble signing in, but we've fixed the issue. You may now resume enjoying your Watchlist functionality and premium content.
Browsing Bonus: Surfing the VRV library now yields personalized recommendations, right on your Home screen. All hail algorithmagic!
Squashed the bug that showed the maturity gate on the Home screen, even when it was switched off in settings.
Managing your Offline Library just got a lot more convenient. Save an entire season for offline viewing with one tap. Use Edit mode to remove multiple synced episodes at once.
Push it to the limit! We've optimized our push notifications so you can stay up-to-date on new shows and movies, plus other important app happenings.

New navigation, new you! Our latest update empowers your thumbs like never before with easy access to your most frequently-used actions – right at the bottom of the screen. Enjoy a more comfortable experience when you’re on the go.

- Introducing iTunes billing! Sign up for Premium access directly from the VRV app to enjoy an ad-free experience complete with offline viewing.
- Found a subtitled anime but you'd prefer to watch the dubbed version? Found a dub but wanted the sub? You can now quickly switch between subbed and dubbed versions of a show directly from the Shows screen.
- Following so many series you can't quite decide what to watch? You can now browse even more of your recently-watched shows from the home screen to easily pick up where you left off.
- We captured some bugs in a jar and let them go outside in a gesture of virtual goodwill. Enjoy improved stability.

- Playback navigation is easier than ever. Fast-forward or reverse playback 10 seconds at a time with just a tap.
- You've got video quality options. Pick your preference with power.
- Watch with subtitles in style via our new selection option.
- Enjoy our overall design update!

- Search is even more stellar with the new Top Results display, which fulfills your queries with relevant episodes, series, or movies.
- We captured the usual bugs and released them back to nature. Sorry, not really, we totally deleted them.
Welcome our updated Watchlist, which puts the power of "on demand" in your streaming hands.
Bug fixes for a more stable experience

Optimized for iOS 13
Bug fixes and improvements
Bug fixes, iOS 13 improvements, behind the scene enhancements.
- Bug fixes and stability improvements.
